alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Logan; Wallace; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 8:04PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Wichita, southeastern Wallace, southwestern Logan and northeastern Greeley Counties through 745 PM MDT/845 PM CDT/... At 703 PM MDT/803 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles south of Wallace, or 17 miles southeast of Sharon Springs, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph and dangerous cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Wichita, southeastern Wallace, southwestern Logan and northeastern Greeley Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
